messages.content: What is DragNUWA implemented in ComfyUI used for?
DragNUWA for ComfyUI enables users to manipulate backgrounds or objects within images directly and generates the corresponding video with seamless camera movements or object motions.
How can I install the DragNUWA extension for ComfyUI?

Clone the repo into the custom_nodes directory of the ComfyUI location, run pip install -r requirements.txt, download the weights of DragNUWA and place them in 'ComfyUI/models/checkpoints/drag_nuwa_svd.pth'.
What tools are available in ComfyUI-DragNUWA?
The Motion Traj Tool is available for generating motion trajectories.
What are the examples of workflows provided with ComfyUI-DragNUWA?
There are four examples of workflows provided: basic workflow, InstantCameraMotionBrush & InstantObjectMotionBrush, optical flow workflow, and motion brush.
